field.description: Which output field this evidence supports (e.g., safest_next_step, plan[0], summary).

source.description: Source anchor referencing an artifact + optional fragment, e.g. artifact:<id>#json:/fix/1 or artifact:<id>#text:line:12-14.

method.description: Optional method ID describing how this evidence mapping was derived.

note.description: Optional short note clarifying the mapping.
